smarttarget.settings.altTarget.name: Target with Alt-Click
smarttarget.settings.altTarget.hint: Target tokens by pressing Alt+Click, add Shift to target multiple
smarttarget.settings.alwaysTarget.name: Always Target
smarttarget.settings.alwaysTarget.hint: Clicking on non-owned tokens automatically targets them
smarttarget.settings.portraitPips.name: Show portraits instead of colors as player target indicators, and customize target indicator
smarttarget.settings.portraitPips.hint: Uses avatar for GM, defaults to Token for players if no avatar is found for the assigned actor (requires refresh)
smarttarget.settings.insidePips.name: Keep target indicators inside the token
smarttarget.settings.insidePips.hint: Move the target indicators in a way that they remain inside the token border
smarttarget.settings.pipImgScale.name: Target Icon Image Scale
smarttarget.settings.pipImgScale.hint: Set the scale for the image used by the target icons (default: 1)
smarttarget.settings.pipOffsetManualY.hi: Add a flat offset to the image in pixels (default: 0)
smarttarget.settings.pipOffsetManualX.hi: Add a flat offset to the image in pixels (default: 0)
smarttarget.settings.pipScale.name: Target Icon Size
smarttarget.settings.pipScale.hint: Set the size for the target icon in pixels (default: 12)
smarttarget.settings.pipOffset.name: Target Icon Offset
smarttarget.settings.pipOffset.hint: Set the distance between icons in pixels (default: 16)
smarttarget.settings.borderThicc.name: Border Thickness
smarttarget.settings.borderThicc.hint: Set the thickness of the border in pixels (default: 2)
smarttarget.settings.crossairSpread.name: Bring Targeting Arrows Closer Together
smarttarget.settings.crossairSpread.hint: Bring the targeting arrows closer together so that they are inside the token frame
smarttarget.settings.crossairColor.name: Targeting Arrows Color
smarttarget.settings.crossairColor.hint: Hex color for the targeting arrows (default: #ff9829)
smarttarget.settings.target-indicator.hi: Select the indicator for a targeted token
smarttarget.settings.use-player-color.na: Use player color for target indicator
smarttarget.settings.use-player-color.hi: Use player color for target indicator
